```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(here)
library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
aquastat = fread(here("data/AQUASTAT Dissemination System.csv"), header = TRUE)

long_data <- pivot_longer(aquastat, cols = 5:ncol(aquastat), names_to = "Year", values_to = "Value", names_prefix = '"')
wide_data <- select(long_data, "Country", "Variable", "Year", "Value") %>% pivot_wider(names_from = "Variable", values_from = "Value")
```

```{r}
african_countries <- c("Algeria", "Angola", "Benin", "Botswana", "Burkina Faso", "Burundi", "Cabo Verde", "Cameroon", "Central African Republic", "Chad", "Comoros", "Congo, Democratic Republic of the", "Congo, Republic of the", "Cote dâ€™Ivoire", "Djibouti", "Egypt", "Equatorial Guinea", "Eritrea", "Eswatini", "Ethiopia", "Gabon", "Gambia", "Ghana", "Guinea", "Guinea-Bissau", "Kenya", "Lesotho", "Liberia", "Libya", "Madagascar", "Malawi", "Mali", "Mauritania", "Mauritius", "Morocco", "Mozambique", "Namibia", "Niger", "Nigeria", "Rwanda", "Sao Tome and Principe", "Senegal", "Seychelles", "Sierra Leone", "Somalia", "South Africa", "South Sudan", "Sudan", "Tanzania", "Togo", "Tunisia", "Uganda", "Zambia", "Zimbabwe")

```

```{r}
# plot the irrigated area time series for SSA countries
long_data %>% 
  filter(Country %in% SSA_countries, Variable == "Area equipped for irrigation: actually irrigated") %>%
  group_by(Year) %>%
  summarize(Value = sum(Value, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_point(aes(x = Year, y = Value))
```

```{r}
# plot the irrigated percent time series for SSA countries
long_data %>% 
  filter(Country %in% SSA_countries, Variable == "% of the cultivated area equipped for irrigation") %>%
  group_by(Year) %>%
  summarize(Value = mean(Value, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_point(aes(x = Year, y = Value)) +
  ylim(0, 100)
```

```{r}
# plot the irrigated percent time series for SSA countries
long_data %>% 
  filter(Country %in% SSA_countries, Variable == "% of the area equipped for irrigation actually irrigated") %>%
  group_by(Year) %>%
  summarize(Value = mean(Value, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_point(aes(x = Year, y = Value)) +
  ylim(0, 100)
```
